sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components"

export const Container = styled.div`
	background: #6fc3f6
	height: 100%
	min-height: 100vh
	display: flex
	flex-direction: column
	align-items: center
	justify-content: center
	`
export const Content = styled.div`
	max-width: 960px
	width: 100%
	margin: auto
	display: flex
	align-items: center
	flex-direction: column
	padding-top: 1rem
	`
